revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Twelve sermons on the prophecies concerning the Christian Church; and, in particular, concerning the Church of Papal Rome: preached in Lincoln's-Inn-Chapel, at the..."
revision.text: Possibly: Twelve sermons on the prophecies concerning the Christian Church; and, in particular, concerning the Church of Papal Rome: preached in Lincoln's-Inn-Chapel, at the lecture of the Right Reverend William Warburton lord bishop of Gloucester. By Samuel Hallifax, D.D. chaplain in Ordinary to His Majesty. (London : Printed by W. Bowyer and J. Nichols: for T. Cadell, in the Strand, MDCCLXXVI. [1776]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2339347~S5
